#labels Manual
*jscep* uses [http://maven.apache.org/ Apache Maven] as its build tool.

== Prerequisites ==

  # Install [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven]
  # Get the Source

=== Downloading Source Packages ===

Source packages are available from the [http://code.google.com/p/jscep/downloads/list?q=*sources.jar downloads] page.

=== Checking Out from Subversion ===

You can checkout the trunk by running the following commands on your command-line:

{{{
user@host:~$ svn checkout http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jscep-read-only
user@host:~$ cd jscep-read-only
}}}

== Maven Commands ===

To build all modules:

{{{
mvn clean install
}}}
